tool_description: Fetch relevant nudges based on keywords, target persona & category.
name: Point-of-care Nudges
title: Point-of-care Nudges

api_list.name: Smart Nudge Search
api_list.description: Fetches relevant nudges based on keywords, categories & target clinician personas (picked from [here](https://adaptrack.com/notion/page-to-personas-for-api))
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://point-of-care-nudges.p.rapidapi.com/smart-search-nudges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "point-of-care-nudges.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://point-of-care-nudges.p.rapidapi.com/smart-search-nudges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "point-of-care-nudges.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
